@MeredithIreland no she will destroy public education there is no doubt about it
@MeredithIreland yep watched that video too... she also didn't know diff between growth model and proficiency which has been 20 year debate
@Andrea_Contos I hope so...I pray to God she does not get confirmed
@Andrea_Contos it is terrifying
It is crucial u call your reps & harass them so DeVos isn't confirmed because the kids who don't have a voice are depending on it
Teachers everywhere go to work because we love the children and are passionate about them...they will all suffer from DeVos is confirmed
Or who receives scholarships to attend private institutions...just like guns "it would be left up to the state" and good luck with that
"Giving children a second option" is a load of crap because there are also no regulations about who is admitted to private schools
That's just the beginning because there's no regulations or parcc testing mandates for private schools...there is no accountability
Because the schools that need those funds most will lose the little they are getting and you will have even harder times hiring teachers
That money will come from the low income districts and the achievement gap that exists with CoC will widen exponentially
The way I saw it, I had a job I loved and could get by when others had much less...but if DeVos is pushed through make no mistake
As a teacher I have seen the struggles with budget and during the recession many teacher including myself took a 3 year pay cut for the kids
If she is permitted to become secretary of education she will take a large chunk of public school funding for private schools
First let me apologize for the political rant I'm about to go on but it is crucial that everyone call their senators about DeVos
